features.featureTitle: Replace the current lucide-react icons with static image assets across the site, specifically: - In `frontend/src/App.tsx`, replace `Phone`, `Mail`, and `MapPin` icon components in the header/mobile header and Contact section with `` tags pointing to new files under `/assets/generated/`. - In `frontend/src/components/BookServiceDialog.tsx`, replace `Loader2` (submitting spinner) and `CheckCircle2` (success state) with `` tags pointing to new files under `/assets/generated/`. The new images must visually match the current icon sizes and alignment (including existing Tailwind sizing classes) and include appropriate `alt` text for accessibility.

Add the required icon image files as static assets under `frontend/public/assets/generated/` using the exact filenames listed in `imageRequirements.required`, so the frontend can reference them via `/assets/generated/...`.
